name: Core UI Components Pack
shortDescription: A set of essential UI components in HTML and CSS for web projects.
description: Core UI Components Pack is a practical set of the most commonly used UI components based on clean HTML and CSS. The product includes ready-made buttons, forms, cards, and a consistent style system that you can use directly in real web projects.
bundleContents: 6 form components (input, textarea, select, checkbox, toggle)
4 UI card types (stat, content, empty, action)

name: SaaS Dashboard Template
shortDescription: A modern SaaS admin dashboard template built with clean HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JS.
description: SaaS Dashboard Template is a ready frontend skeleton for SaaS apps, designed as a solid base for admin panels, analytics systems, and web applications. The product is built with clean HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript and includes complete view structure, mock data, and a consistent style system. The dashboard lets you start your own app quickly without frameworks or backend.
requirements: Modern browser, basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

name: UI Illustration Pack
shortDescription: A set of ready UI illustrations for dashboards, SaaS apps, and web interfaces.
description: UI Illustration Pack is a set of 14 modern interface illustrations designed for web apps, admin panels, and SaaS products. The pack focuses on real UI scenarios such as dashboards, analytics, user views, settings, and empty states. The illustrations are lightweight, consistent, and built for developers - without stock-like styling or unnecessary detail.
requirements: Modern browser, basic knowledge of HTML and CSS
bundleContents: 14 UI illustrations designed for web apps and SaaS
Scenes: dashboard, analytics, users, settings, onboarding
4 empty state illustrations (no data, no results, error, success)
Illustrations optimized for light and dark UI
Consistent style tailored to user interfaces

name: Logic Flashcards for Kids
shortDescription: A set of educational flashcards that develops logical thinking and algorithmic basics in kids.
description: Logic Flashcards for Kids is a carefully designed set of educational flashcards for school-age children that builds logical thinking, problem analysis, and understanding of sequences and cause-effect relationships. The product does not teach a specific programming language, but builds strong foundations of algorithmic thinking that are key in math, computer science, and programming. The cards are visual and easy to use for play, self-study, or learning with a parent or teacher.
bundleContents: Tasks based on sequences and patterns
Exercises like: what comes next, what does not fit, find the rule
